directory_desc: Create a directory to organize your resources.
file_desc: Resource allowing to drop a file of any format on the platform. PDF, audio, video and image files are readable in the platform. Any other type has to be downloaded.
new_resource_select: 1. Choose the type of resource to create
resource_end_certificates: Display the download of the workspace certificates
resource_rights_admin_tip: This resource is accessible by managers only.
resource_rights_all_tip: This resource is accessible by everyone.
resource_rights_custom_help: This resource has custom rules that needs to be managed in 'Advanced' tab.
resource_rights_user_tip: This resource is accessible by platform users.
resource_rights_workspace_tip: This resource is accessible by workspace users.
resource_showIcon: Display the resource icon in the header
resource_showIcon_help: For evaluative resources, icon is replaced by a progression gauge.
resource_views: {0} This resource has never been viewed. | {1} This resource has been viewed once. | ]1,Inf[ This resource has been viewed %count% times.
restricted_access_message: You can not access this resource because all access conditions are not met.
text_desc: Allow to edit a rich text (link, image, video) directly on the platform.
resources_restore_message: {1} Are you sure you want to restore this resource? | [2,Inf[ Are you sure you want to restore these %count% resources?
resources_delete_message: {1} Are you sure you want to delete this resource? | [2,Inf[ Are you sure you want to delete these %count% resources?
all_resources_help: You will find below all the resources of the workspace in which you have participated.
required_resources_help: You will find below all the resources to do to progress in the workspace.
not_found_desc: We are sorry, we could not find your resource. It is possible that it does not exist (or no longer) or that the URL used is incorrect.
rights_loading: We are loading the resource rights...
no_started_resource: You have not started any resources.
no_started_resource_help: Browse your resources to see your progress in each of them here.
resourceOpen: The resource resourceName has been opened by user userName
resourceEvaluation: resourceName - statusName : userName is currently in step userProgression for a duration of durationTime sec
resourceScore: resourceName - statusName : userName scored currentScore out on scoreMax. The min score is scoreMin

restrictions.dismiss_help: As a manager, you can still access the resource, even if the access conditions are not met.
restrictions.manager: You are a manager of this resource.
restrictions.manager_help: Your manager rights allow you to access all the features of the resource.
restrictions.rights: You can access to this resource.
restrictions.rights_help: Your rights allow you to access one or more features of the resource.
restrictions.no_rights: You do not own the necessary rights to access this resource.
restrictions.no_rights_help: Please contact a manager if you think you should have access to this resource.
restrictions.not_published_help: Please wait while one of the managers publishes the resource.
restrictions.deleted_help: You can no longer access the content of deleted resources.
restrictions.locked_help: Please enter the code given to you in order to access the resource.
restrictions.period_opened: The access period to the resource is currently in progress.
restrictions.period_opened_help: The resource is accessible from %start% to %end%.
restrictions.period_not_limited: The access period to the resource is not limited.
restrictions.not_started: The resource is not yet accessible.
restrictions.ended: The resource is no longer accessible.
restrictions.location_authorized: You are using one of the authorized workstations.
restrictions.location_unauthorized: Access must be from an authorized workstation.
restrictions.location_unauthorized_help: Please use one of the authorized workstations to access the resource.

forbidden: Access to the resource not possible
forbidden_desc: You do not have access to this resource. Please contact an administrator to give you the necessary rights.
require_resource: The resource is used in the progression of the workspace
require_resource_help: Users will need to complete this resource to progress through the workspace.
evaluate_resource: The resource is used in the score of the workspace
evaluate_resource_help: The score obtained by users at this resource is used to calculate the score of the workspace.
file_drop_help: Drop your files to import them inside the directory
